panel.label: RLVa
panel.name: RLVa panel

check_box.label: Forbid changing Windlight settings via RLV
check_box.tool_tip: When TRUE, forbids to set the environment (time of day and Windlight settings) via RestrainedLove. Needs a restart of the viewer.
check_box.name: RLVaNSE

check_box.label: Use RLV Ellipsis
check_box.tool_tip: When TRUE, show '...' when someone speaks, while the avatar is prevented from hearing. When FALSE, don't show anything.
check_box.name: RLVaEllipsis

check_box.label: Enable Composite Folders
check_box.tool_tip: Enables composite folders for shared inventory
check_box.name: RLVaCompo

check_box.label: Enable Legacy folder naming
check_box.tool_tip: Enables legacy naming convention for folders
check_box.name: RLVaLNaming

check_box.label: Enable shared Wear
check_box.tool_tip: Attachments in the shared #RLV folder can be force-attached without needing to specify an attachment point
check_box.name: RLVaSharedWear

check_box.label: Disable blocking of replace wearables
check_box.tool_tip: Don't block wear replace when at least one attachment on the target attachment point is non-detachable
check_box.name: RLVaReplaceWearables

check_box.label: Disable giving sub-folders to the RLV folder
check_box.tool_tip: When TRUE, forbids to give sub-folders to the #RLV RestrainedLove folder.
check_box.name: RLVaFGT

check_box.label: Hide locked wearable layers
check_box.tool_tip: Hides 'remove outfit' restricted worn clothing layers from @getoufit
check_box.name: RLVaHidelocked

check_box.label: Hide 'unset' or 'duplicate' commands
check_box.tool_tip: Suppresses reporting 'unset' or 'duplicate' command restrictions when RestrainedLoveDebug is TRUE
check_box.name: RLVaHUD

check_box.label: Show RLVa Name tags
check_box.tool_tip: Display of names above avatars is subject to the general 'Show Names' setting when @shownames=n restricted
check_box.name: RLVaNames

check_box.label: Auto. rename shared inventory items
check_box.tool_tip: Automatically renames shared inventory items when worn
check_box.name: RLVaARename

check_box.label: Restrained Love (A) Debug messages:
check_box.tool_tip: TRUE shows all RLV commands which would be normally hidden (to prevent chat spam) , good for debugging
check_box.name: RLVaDebug

check_box.label: Show Assertion failures
check_box.tool_tip: Notify the user when an assertion fails
check_box.name: RLVaAssertion

panel.text: 'Add' or 'Replace' wearables in a folder beginning with:

line_editor.name: RLVaReplacebegins
line_editor.tool_tip: If a folder name begins with this string, its attach behavior will always be 'replace', never 'stack'. Default is blank (disabled).

line_editor.name: RLVaReplacebegins
line_editor.tool_tip: If a folder name begins with this string, its attach behavior will always be 'stack', never 'replace'. Default is '+'.

radio_group.name: not_embed_in_IM
radio_group.tool_tip: Controls notification panel embedding in IMs (0 = default, 1 = focused, 2 = never)
